Rejoice! 'Made In Heaven' Is Being Renewed For Season 2 & We Can't Wait To Witness More Weddings
Zoya Akhtar and Reema Kagti's web-series Made In Heaven went on to become one of the most popular and widely-discussed shows and for all the right reasons. Finally, India could boast about a show on weddings, that depicted the harsh realities that lie behind the glitzy wedding albums that we adore.
The show revolved around two main characters Tara and Karan but the show revolved around some real-life scenarios that persist in the Indian society.
(Also read: 'Made In Heaven' Is A Show Every Aunty Who Wants You To Get Married & Settle Down Must Watch!)
Amazon Prime
The show was loved by a lot of people and now we have a piece of news that will make a lot of you people happy.

The second season of the show is already in the pipeline and a Spotboye report has confirmed it. A source confirmed the news and was quoted in the same report as saying:
Tiger Baby and Excel
“Now, that's natural. You can't have the exact cast. But as things stand today, we are making Made In Heaven 2.”
The web series released on March 8 and starred Arjun Mathur, Sobhita Dhulipala, Kalki Koechlin, Jim Sarbh, Shashank Arora, and Shivani Raghuvanshi in pivotal roles.
